entry.title: His Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,649Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 42

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 115,098Chapters: 33/37Kudos: 39

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he‚Äôs finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn‚Äôt want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn‚Äôt finished yet, and she won‚Äôt rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won‚Äôt allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Echoes of You (Traduccion de "Hasta Encontrarte")
entry.summary:
Author: ariadna19

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,994Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Beacon Hills was eerily silent.It wasn‚Äôt the kind of silence that comes before a storm, nor the hush of a forest at dusk. It was a void. As if something had been ripped out of the world‚Ä¶ and no one could remember what.Scott noticed it first. Lydia felt it in her bones. Malia smelt it in the air. But no one could name it. No one could say what was missing.Except Derek. From the moment he crossed the town‚Äôs border, he knew something essential was gone. He couldn‚Äôt explain it, couldn‚Äôt name it, but he felt it like an open wound. And he wouldn‚Äôt stop until he discovered what‚Äîor who‚Äîhad been erased from the world.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------üí≠What if the pack had called Derek during the Ghost Riders disaster in season 6A? What if he were the only one who could feel Stiles‚Äô absence?

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,680Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 80

Summary: Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.~*~An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he‚Äôs gripping the woman‚Äôs arm too tightly, but he can‚Äôt seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There‚Äôs beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,938Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 45

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power‚Äîand its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he‚Äôs determined to protect the Stilinski legacy‚Äîeven without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family‚Äîfeared for their near-feral strength‚Äîemerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox‚Äôs cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,764Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 121

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There‚Äôs an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.
